headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SILVERBERG, JEROLL R

snippet: SILVERBERG--Jeroll R. Born January 9, 1924. Died June 23, 2016 in Stuart, FL. Prominent Family law attorney from New Canaan, CT. Jerry died peacefully at home Thursday evening. He graduated from Bucknell University and had a law degree from Duke University. Father of four children Ellen, Phyllis (Leslie Koren) and twins David (Gina) and Larry (Deb), three grandsons Daniel, Davi and Jonathan and two granddaughters Corinne and Natalie. Jerry was a beloved grandfather to Stacey Plax Gardner and Jordan McKenna. His wife Jaci shared not only her life but also her brother David Drucker, his wife Penny, their children Amy and Jesse and great nephew Mateo. Her sons Dr. David and Peter Segaloff and their wives Judy and Deb. Claiming their children too with love Avi, Hannah, Ben, Eli and Shalom, Sabine and Emma. Well respected in New Canaan and the nation with his membership of the Dirtie Thirtie top thirty divorce lawyers. Funeral will be held at Temple Sinai, 458 Lakeside Dr, Stamford, Connecticut, Rabbi Jay TelRav, 11:30am, Sunday, June 26, Cemetery then return for Meal of consolation at Synagogue. The family will observe Shiva on Sunday evening. Donations in his memory may be made to The Community Foundation of Virgin Islands, Jerry Silverberg Trumpet Award and Scholarship, P.O. Box 11790, St. Thomas, USVI, 00801 or to: Treasure Coast Hospice, 1201 SE Indian Street, Stuart, FL, 34997. 1/3
